alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 3:41AM MST until January 06 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Locally higher amounts possible along benches as well as the Ogden Valley. * WHERE...Cache Valley/Utah Portion, Wasatch Back and Bear Lake and Bear River Valley. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions including snow covered roads and greatly reduced visibility can be expected at times from Tuesday morning through Wednesday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Wasatch Back
